titleStmt.title: The great charity of instructing poor children A sermon preached at St. Botolph Aldgate; upon Lord's-day, Mar. 24. 1700. On the occasion of a charity-school newly erected in that parish. By Josiah Woodward, minister of Popler.
titleStmt.author: Woodward, Josiah, 1660-1712.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by K. Astwood, for Ra. Sympson, at the Harp in St. Paul's Church-Yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Durham Cathedral Library.
